title: My CLUB
body: I am a leader of a club but I just logged on today and I don't see my club or my chatroom, I ask my friends and they say I'm still leader is this a glitch or something? I tried re-logging doesn't work.

replies.body:
This is a bug that popped up after the clubs re-enable. We're aware of it and are working on a fix. I can't provide an ETA on when that solution will deploy, but you can keep up with updates on this issue [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016).

Let me know if you have any questions.
i have the same problem!!! D:
